title: Summer Hearts
description: Savor the magic of Josie Riviera’s Summer Romances—exclusively in one collection!A sweet, heartwarming story is the hallmark of a romantic holiday season.With this exciting offer exclusively from USA Today bestselling author Josie Riviera, enjoy three emotionally satisfying sweet and inspirational romances, a trio all wrapped up and ready to read! Bundle up and save with captivating stories celebrating the promise of new beginnings and beautiful summers.This set includes three sweet and inspirational romances:1-800-SUMMERThe last thing she can fix is her own life. Until one man’s offer changes everything.A Chocolate-Box Summer BreezeWill Emily and Joe find their happily-ever-after in a forgotten summer breeze?A Summer To CherishFaith is fragile. Faith takes time. And the best solutions are always painted with love.If you love to binge-watch a certain wholesome holiday movie channel, Josie Riviera’s romance bundle is the perfect gift to yourself any time of the year.
author: Josie Riviera
